bibl.title: Papyri and Ostraca Kept in the Department of Papyrology of Warsaw University. A Web Page Project.
bibl.note: Announce the creation of an Internet site with digitised images of all papyri and ostraca kept in the Department of Papyrology. - Pp. 267-270: List of the papyri and the ostraca.
bibl.seg: WIPSZYCKA Ewa, Tomasz DERDA, Tomasz MARKIEWICZ and Jakub URBANIK, Papyri and Ostraca Kept in the Department of Papyrology of Warsaw University. A Web Page Project.
Announce the creation of an Internet site with digitised images of all papyri and ostraca kept in the Department of Papyrology. - Pp. 267-270: List of the papyri and the ostraca.
